about_the_game:
The year is 1349, Europe is struck by the plague and doomsday is closer than ever. As monk-detective, head to the underground of Pomposa Abbey, collect items, fight enemies and discover the secrets of the abbey in the ever-changing dungeons. Uncover the horrific human and celestial acts that take place in the monastery and unlock new characters, items and upgrades.

Gather your courage and explore mysterious dungeons

Underground of the Pomposa Abbey is hiding a lot of ancient secrets. Explore a mysterious ever-changing dungeon system swarmed with enemies and traps to uncover demonic secrets of the Abbey.

Investigate the mysteries of Pomposa Abbey

Collect fragments of writings and books to progress in your investigation and unlock new records in the unique Investigation tree. Each node in the tree uncovers a different part of the story and unlocks new characters, items and upgrades. Confront monks, commoners and nobility with your findings and save the world from eternal suffering!

Features:

  • Turn based combat with plenty of gameplay styles
  • Collect 200+ weapons, armors and consumables with various synergies
  • Fight 50+ enemies and bosses with different attack patterns
  • Explore procedurally generated dungeons
  • Investigate unholy secrets with unique unlock system
  • Play as one of the 3 monks in a hostile environment
  • Meet 20+ characters in the Abbey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Celestia: Divine Revelation is under development and the minimum requirements might change before a full release.

short_description: Discover the dungeons beneath the medieval monastery, fight the enemies, collect items, and uncover the horrible mystery of Pomposa Abbey. Celestia: Divine Revelation is a turn-based RPG with roguelike elements and a detective story.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Russian
*languages with full audio support
